org.openimaj.picslurper

Class StatusConsumer.StatusConsumerRedirectStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultRedirectStrategy
      • org.openimaj.io.HttpUtils.MetaRefreshRedirectStrategy
        • org.openimaj.picslurper.StatusConsumer.StatusConsumerRedirectStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.client.RedirectStrategy
    Enclosing class:
    StatusConsumer

    public static class StatusConsumer.StatusConsumerRedirectStrategy
extends HttpUtils.MetaRefreshRedirectStrategy
    An extention of the HttpUtils.MetaRefreshRedirectStrategy which disallows all redirects and instead remembers a redirect for use later on.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
